name: Planet Defender (itch) (Thorvaldemar)
description:
Install instructions

The game is very easy to download and install, but if you have problems, here is maybe an answer.

Windows says that there is a virus on it:

Maybe i should be able to remove that, but i haven't looked in to it yet, for now just click "Show more", and then "Run anyway".

Some files are missing??:

If you get a popup message that tells you some files a missing, or something like that, you properly forgot to unpack the files (Remeber that the data folder, needs to be the same place as the .exe program. this only goes for Linux and Windows)
